Copy an Existing Access Control Database:Select this button, and then enter the path and name of the access control database you want to copy or click the Browse button to select one.
Use an Existing Access Control Database:Select this button, and then enter the path and name of the access control database you want the project database to use or click the Browse button to select one. This option does not copy the access control database you select; the new project database references the access control database in its original location.
Copy an Existing Configuration File: Select this button, and then enter the path and name of the configuration file you want to copy or click the Browse button to select one.
Use an Existing Configuration File: Select this button, and then enter the path and name of the configuration file you want the project database to use or click the Browse button to select one. This option does not copy the configuration file you select; the new project database references the configuration file in its original location.
